projects.name: Moon Cal
projects.description: A beautiful, privacy-focused menstrual cycle tracker app. It helps users log symptoms, track their cycle phases, predict upcoming periods, and take control of their reproductive health.

projects.name: Dev Talk Forum
projects.description: A modern, mobile-friendly forum app for topic-based discussions. Features real-time updates, user profiles, categories, and a clean, responsive UI.

projects.name: My Money Manager
projects.description: A modern, mobile-first personal finance tracker app. It helps users manage income and expenses, switch themes, track currency values, and visualize data through dynamic charts.
